title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.9 - Use of nonconforming decals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.9 - Use of nonconforming decals

State Regulations
A municipality which had an anti-theft decal in use prior
to September 17, 2002, may continue operation of its program as it existed
prior to such date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
